amendment.description: Amendment prohibits funds in the bill from being obligated or expended to conduct the San Gabriel Watershed and Mountains Special Resource Study in certain designated cities in California.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit funds made available in the Act from being obligated or expended to conduct the San Gabriel Watershed and Mountains Special Resource Study.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Miller, Gary amendment (A020) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment (A020) offered by Mr. Miller, Gary.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A020) offered by Mr. Miller, Gary.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Miller, Gary amendment (A020) Agreed to by voice vote.
